name: PEM_XS_BAT_PERF_STAT_ALL_CPU_EVENT_PSYS_PL2_TPMI
summary: Verify all CPUs in system-wide which core base_frequency excursion occurred due to PSys (Platform RAPL) power limit 2 set via PSys MSR or TPMI interface (E.g. powercap/intel-rapl*/constraint_1_power_limit_uw for attribute name=psys).duration=10/ sleep 60
